properties.address: Wakefield Road, Denby Dale, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire HD8 8RX
properties.description: All our libraries are heated, comfortable to stay in for long periods of time - they have a range of both comfy seating, and more functional furniture for study or computer use. A place to keep warm, meet friends, sit and read and take part in activities.
properties.title: Denby Dale Library
